qMeasure.qDef:
Sum ( {<[Opportunity Won/Lost]={'WON'} >}[Opportunity Amount] * $(='ExRate_USD')*[Opportunity Probability]) /
sum( {<[Opportunity Won/Lost]={'WON'} >}[Opportunity_Count])

qMetaDef.description: Average Revenue per opportunity adjusted with Win probability USD
qMetaDef.title: Avg Revenue per Opp
